name: Where are you, Cinderella?
storyline:
On the one hand, we have Tam, a quiet and reserved Vietnamese girl who is cherished by her family. On the other hand, we have her brother Alberto, a smiling and nice Italian boy who has little confidence in himself.

While they seemed to be inseparable since they met, fate had other plans. During a trip to Vietnam, they lost sight of each other. Their only clue to find each other is a poor shoe left on the road and their dreams to become celebrities.

What if… all they have to do is to shine on stage? What if… all they have to do is to fulfill their dreams? So they will be able to see the light that will guide them to find each other.

In a world where Vietnamese culture is honored, will you be able to find the owner of this shoe?
summary:
In a world where Vietnamese culture is honored, will you be able to find the owner of this shoe?

Where are you, Cinderella? is a visual novel that follows the adventure of two children: Tam and Alberto. Their dream is to become celebrities together, but fate has decided otherwise.
